modName: Daylight ENB - Colorful and Performance Friendly ENB Preset
summary: A colorful ENB preset that is also very friendly against your performance without sacrificing any graphical quality.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][u][color=#38761d]Day[/color][color=#bf9000]lig[/color][color=#ffff00]ht[/color][/u] [u][color=#38761d]E[/color][color=#bf9000]N[/color][color=#ffff00]B[/color][/u][/size][/center][font=Arial][b][center][size=3]Performance Friendly Color Enhancer[/size][/center][/b]
[b][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0265.htm][center]Get the v0.265 binary here![/center][/url][/b]
[size=3][i]This is an ENB preset that has been adjusted to bring out the best of the glorious daytime in Skyrim. The sun is mighty and voluminous, and the flora is positively sprawling with energy in this beautiful-but-lightweight preset.[/i][/size]

[b][size=3]How to make your Skyrim look this good:[/size][/b]
[size=2]1. Download and unzip this file (daylight_enb_X.X) to a temporary directory.[/size]
[size=2]2. Download the v0.265 binary from: http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0265.htm[/size]
[size=2]3. Extract d3d9.dll from the "WrapperVersion" folder and place it in a temporary directory.[/size]
[size=2]3.5 (Optional) Extract the enblocal.ini file and place it in the same directory. Open it with Notepad and configure it [/size]
[size=2]according to this guide: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50214/[/size]
[size=2]4. Copy all files into your Skyrim install directory (where your TESV.exe is located, usually in "\..\Steam\Steamapps\common\skyrim\".[/size]
[size=2]5. Run Skyrim, and don't forget to take some screenshots![/size]

[b][size=3]Recommended supplementary mods:
[/size][/b][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?]Cabal120
[/url][/size][/font][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]SkySight Skins[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2546964/?]fadingsignal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41808/?]Vurt
[/url][/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1402285/?]jjc71[/url]
[/size]
author: Hammerbane
